# WEEK 8: Neurofilters

**Write 250 words each day.**  
**Due: Sunday, June 01, 2025 at 11:59 PM**

## Day 1 — Monday, May 19, 2025

Neurofilters — Think of a time when you didn’t notice something obvious. What was your attention system doing?

## Day 2 — Tuesday, May 20, 2025

False Positives — Write about a time your brain misidentified a pattern. What did you learn from the illusion?

## Day 3 — Wednesday, May 21, 2025

Input Error — Describe a moment when what you heard or saw was totally different from what someone else experienced.

## Day 4 — Thursday, May 22, 2025

Perceptual Reboot — Write about an experience that changed how you literally saw or heard the world.

## Day 5 — Friday, May 23, 2025

Recognition Model — Describe a friend or family member’s “face” in terms of pattern recognition: what features define them for you?
